question: hi,now im 32weeks 6days pregnancy...doctor told me that I will deliver latest 34weeks...another 8days to go or less...I got high blood pressure and diabetes...but now I think theres no problem anymore about diabetes..only my bp..hmm,I keep prays that I will deliver my baby normal..if so I have to..then its ok,as long as my babys fine..sigh...
title: Give birth my baby late 34weeks. OMG
